name: Callemanía / Streetmania 2008
description:
Spectrum-SDV2. Arcade. Conduce tu poderoso vehículo a través de peligrosas calles, a fin de llegar a tiempo a la cita con tu prometida. Tu contrincante, Turbo Paredes, no descansará hasta verte hecho trizas. 

Spectrum-SDV2. Arcade. You must drive your powerful car to meet your girlfriend on time, across dangerous streets with heavy traffic. Your opponent, Turbo Wahl, will try to "tune" your car and your face before you meet her.
